metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7428 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
ntpd in NTP before 4.2.8p9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (reject broadcast mode packets) via the poll interval in a broadcast packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> ntp-4.2.8p6, up to but not including ntp-4.2.8p9, and ntp-4.3.90 up to, but not including ntp-4.3.94  introduced with CVE-2015-7973 patch

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5').
